description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Milawa, Australia. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Romantic Lancemore Wine-Lovers' Escape in the Heart of the King Valley
hotels.description: Known as a foodie’s heaven and a wine connoisseur’s delight, the picturesque Lancemore Milawa offers visitors a breath of fresh country air in the gourmet King Valley region of Victoria’s beautiful High Country. Nestled amid lush countryside and rolling vineyards, the hotel provides the perfect opportunity to indulge, relax and explore the stunning scenery and local culinary scene. Ideally located only 2.5 hours' drive from Melbourne, the hotel is perfectly placed for exploring world-class epicurean hot spots such as the award-winning Milawa Cheese Company and the King Valley Prosecco Road, a haven of picturesque vineyards home to the iconic Brown Brothers winery. First-class onsite facilities include a gourmet restaurant, outdoor swimming pool and a cosy wood fireplace to ensure a romantic escape year-round.

seo.title: Hôtels à Milawa - Australie Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trouvez les meilleurs hôtels à Milawa, Australia avec des offres exclusives. Réservez votre escapade parfaite avec jusqu'à 60% de réduction.
